settings.description: jQuery UI Accordion - based on the jQuery UI Accordion
settings.help:
Compatibility notes

  • Active Hover Delay - not currently supported
  • Pager - not currently supported

property.name: Theme
property.caption: JQuery UI Theme
property.help: The jQuery UI theme used to style the tabs

property.name: AutoHeight
property.caption: AutoHeight
property.help: If set, the highest content part is used as height reference for all other parts. Provides more consistent animations.

property.name: Collapsible
property.caption: Collapsible
property.help: Determines whether all the sections can be closed at once

property.name: StartCollapsed
property.caption: Start Collapsed
property.help: If collapsible is set, this will start with all sections closed
